name: Unimog Off-Road Truck Simulator: Rail Road Drive
name_original: Unimog Off-Road Truck Simulator: Rail Road Drive
description:
This Unimog Simulator (Unimog is a range of multi-purpose all-wheel drive medium trucks) gives you chance to drive a Rail-Road. This Unimog Simulator (Unimog is a range of multi-purpose all-wheel drive medium trucks) gives you chance to drive a Rail-Road truck in offroad conditions, This multi-purpose truck is equipped to travel both on normal road terrains and on rail tracks. Just go ahead ride onto it, drive on it in offroads and convert it for rail ready truck but switching on train wheels. Train wheels enable it to travel on rail tracks.

Missions are designed to enable learning of unimogs, how do they work, how do they enable to travel on both roads and rails. How to switch and drive these.
this offroad simulation game would give you learning and driving chance.


-> Rail-Road unimog truck for offroad conditions
-> Conversion of road truck to rail truck
-> offroad jungle environment with train track
-> great road and rail control
